name: yai-nexus-agentkit-monorepo
description: Monorepo for yai-nexus-agentkit SDK and its example applications.

scripts.dev:example:python: cd examples/python-backend && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python main.py
scripts.dev:example:sls-loguru: cd examples/sls-loguru-example && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python main.py

author: YAI Nexus Team
